/* Media operations */ POV analysis. If you want POV analysis you need to add actual sources, not your own. in fact it was bared due to its racism

"authored by France and the U.S. in an uncommon show of cooperation" isnt NPOV. Change to "coauthored by France and..." Just the facts, ma'am.
